column4: Ok, got a SiS gfx card and problems with DRI. Does _anyone_ know _anything_ related to that?
what card?
Hang on a sec...
Silicon Integrated Systems [SiS]  65x/M650/740 PCI/AGP VGA Display Adapter
I used to have a 630 ... no DRI support for that... no idea with 740 though
Hmm... So... No hope for anything OpenGL?
No GL screensavers work here and TuxRacer is pure lag. :/
However, glxgears reports "935 frames in 5.0 seconds = 187.000 FPS"
Hmm, you got any suggestions? Shouldn't the GL screensavers work?
bother daniels, eventually he will answer  ;)
lol
try plugin the speakers into CDROM itself  ;)
Hehe
heh... no really... I've had alsa figure it out before... but without a cable connecting cdrom to sound, thats the easiest way...
Did you just support my claim or...?
via some players you don't (WMP comes to mind... and I believe even kscd) but gnome-cd won't "bridge" that...
depends, what was your claim?
Exactly what you just said. :)
oh... then I guess I did  8)
Second! :)
